title: Lowrance Hook Reveal 9 inch Fishfinders with Preloaded C-MAP Options
descriptions:
Hook more. Hunt less. The Lowrance Hook Reveal 9 brings pro-level fish-finding power to every trip with a brilliant 9-inch SolarMAX display that stays sharp and glare-free, even in direct sun. See fish pop off the screen with FishReveal, which fuses proven Lowrance CHIRP target separation with DownScan Imaging for unmistakable fish identification over structure.

Dial in new water fast with preloaded high-detail C-MAP options, including coverage for nearly 4,000 U.S. inland lakes. Want even more precision? Use Genesis Live to create real-time custom contour maps as you troll, cast, and explore.

The included TripleShot transducer simplifies your setup while maximizing performance: wide-angle high CHIRP for finding fish, plus SideScan and DownScan Imaging for crisp, high-resolution views of structure and coverâ€”all from a single transducer. And with Autotuning Sonar, the Hook Reveal 9 automatically adjusts to changing conditions, delivering the best possible image without constant tweaking.

Key benefits:
- 9-inch SolarMAX display for crystal-clear, daylight-readable views.
- FishReveal makes fish stand out on-screen over structure.
- Preloaded C-MAP inland coverage with nearly 4,000 lakes.
- Genesis Live real-time contour mapping.
- TripleShot transducer: CHIRP, SideScan, and DownScan in one.
- Autotuning Sonar for hassle-free, optimized performance.

Find them faster. See them clearer. Catch more with the Lowrance Hook Reveal 9 inch Fishfinder.
